Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Ambre in Paris (Gare d'Austerlitz - Place d'Italie), you'll be close to Halle Georges Carpentier and Notre Dame Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Cite Internationale Universitaire de Paris and Parc Montsouris.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 26 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). This hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a cruise ship terminal shuttle.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11:30 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Ambre in Paris (Gare d'Austerlitz - Place d'Italie), you'll be close to Halle Georges Carpentier and Notre Dame Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Cite Internationale Universitaire de Paris and Parc Montsouris.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Halle Georges Carpentier - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Cite Internationale Universitaire de Paris - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Parc Montsouris - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Pitie-Salpetriere Hospital - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Paris Observatory - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Paris Catacombs - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
National Library - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Place Denfert-Rocherau - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Jardin des Plantes - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Grande Galerie de l'Evolution - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Ecole normale superieure - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Cartier Foundation for Contemporary Art - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Paris Diderot University - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Menagerie du Jardin des Plantes - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Gallery of Comparative Anatomy and Paleontology - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 25.4 km / 15.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Ambre is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
